name: create_meeting_space
description:
Creates a new meeting space.

This function adds a new meeting space to the database with the specified
name and content details.

space_name.description: The name of the new space. Must be a non-empty string.

meetingCode.description: A unique code for joining the meeting

meetingUri.description: A URI that can be used to join the meeting

accessType.description: The access level for the space

space_content.description: A dictionary containing the details of the new space.

name: end_active_conference_in_space
description:
Ends an active conference in a meeting space, if one exists.

This function removes the activeConference field from the specified space,
effectively marking any active conference as ended. This operation is
irreversible and will permanently remove the active conference data from
the space.

name.description: The name of the space to end the active conference in.

name: get_conference_record
description:
Gets a conference record by conference ID.

Retrieves detailed information about a specific conference record.

name.description: Resource name of the conference to retrieve.

name: get_conference_recording
description: Gets a recording by recording ID.

name: get_conference_transcript
description: Gets a transcript by transcript ID.

name: get_meeting_space_details
description:
Gets details about a meeting space.

Retrieves comprehensive information about a specific meeting space.

name.description: The name of the space to retrieve.

name: get_participant_session
description:
Gets a participant session by session ID.

Retrieves detailed information about a specific participant session.

name.description: Resource name (ID) of the session to retrieve.

name: get_transcript_entry
description: Gets a transcript entry by entry ID.

name: list_conference_participants
description: Lists participants of a conference record.

parent.description: The parent conference record resource name.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of participants to return, defaults to 100.

pageToken.description: The token for continued list pagination.

name: list_conference_recordings
description: Lists the recordings of a conference.

parent.description: The parent resource name. Must be a non-empty string.

parent_conference_record.description: The parent conference record. Must be a non-empty string.

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of recordings to return. Must be a positive integer 
between 1 and 1000. Defaults to None (no limit).

pageToken.description: The token for continued list pagination. Must be a string if provided.

name: list_conference_records
description:
Lists the conference records.

Retrieves a list of conference records with optional filtering and pagination.
By default, results are ordered by start time in descending order (most recent first).

filter.description:
An optional filter string to apply to the records. The filter is applied
to the string representation of each record object.

pageSize.description: An optional maximum number of records to return per page, defaults to 100.

pageToken.description: An optional token for pagination, representing the start index.

name: list_conference_transcript
description: Lists the transcripts of a conference.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of transcripts to return.

pageToken.description: The token for continued list pagination.

name: list_participant_sessions
description:
Lists the sessions of a participant.

Retrieves all sessions associated with the specified participant, with optional
filtering and pagination. Results are sorted by join time in ascending order.

parent.description: The parent participant resource name (participant ID).

filter.description:
An optional filter string to apply to the sessions. The filter is applied
to the string representation of each session object.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of sessions to return per page. Defaults to 100.

pageToken.description: The token for continued list pagination, representing the start index.

name: list_transcript_entries
description: Lists the entries of a transcript.

pageSize.description: The maximum number of entries to return.

pageToken.description: The token for continued list pagination.

name: update_meeting_space
description:
Updates details about a meeting space.

Modifies the specified fields of an existing meeting space. Only fields
that are included in the update_mask will be changed.

name.description: The name of the space to update.

accessType.description: The access level for the space (e.g., "TRUSTED", "RESTRICTED", "OPEN").

entryPointAccess.description: Control who can access entry points (e.g., "ALL", "CREATOR_APP_ONLY").

meetingCode.description: Code used to join the meeting.

meetingUri.description: URI that can be used to join the meeting.

conferenceId.description: The unique identifier for the conference.

activeConference.description: Optional information about an active conference with keys:

update_mask.description:
Dictionary containing fields to update
and their new values. Can include keys:
